mapper.insert: insert into zt_config ( mac, lic_number, sim_number, version, version_sys, ecu_type, car_type, update_tag, update_cfg_tag, report_time ) values ( '${configInfo.mac}', '${configInfo.licNumber}', '${configInfo.simNumber}', '${configInfo.version}', '${configInfo.version}', '${configInfo.ecuType}', '${configInfo.carType}', 0, 0, now() )
mapper.update: update zt_device_config set lic_number = '${configInfo.licNumber}', sim_number = '${configInfo.simNumber}', version = '${configInfo.version}', ecu_type = '${configInfo.ecuType}', car_type = '${configInfo.carType}', report_time = now() where mac = '${configInfo.mac}'
mapper.select: select mac, car_number carNumber, dev_phone devPhone, version, version_sys versionSys, ecu_type ecuType, car_type carType, update_tag updateTag, update_cfg_tag updateCfgTag, report_time reportTime from zt_config where mac = '${mac}' limit 1
